title: Register and use Cattle Tracing System (CTS) Online

details.description: Register with BCMS's online service to register cattle births and report cattle deaths and cattle movements online
details.more_information:
New users will need to register.

Getting help

The Rural Payments Agency website has CTS Online user guides.

You can also contact the British Cattle Movement Service (BCMS) Helpline.

BCMS Helpline

ctsonline@bcms.rpa.gsi.gov.uk
0845 050 1234
Monday to Friday, 8am to 5:30pm
Saturday, 9am to 1pm

Cross compliance

These standards are part of cross compliance. You must meet them to get your farming subsidy under the Single Payment Scheme.
details.introduction: Register cattle births. Report cattle deaths and movements. See details of your herd and individual animals. Make sure your records match those on CTS Online.
